doc.field: Training binder from vendor on Kidde's Fire Suppression System, using gas (1996) and Kidde manual on their CO2 suppression system (2001). Vendor manual from Sapphire on suppression system (2005). FDNY MARC (Management Appraisal, Reviews and Compliance) report for Division 11, Aug 2, 2001. News articles and other related print matter on WTC, especially collapse (WNYF articles, FEMA "WTC: Building Performance Study" of May 2002), including conspiracy theories, out to circa 2008. DVD of TLC show on collapse. DVD of History Channel show skyscraper firefighting. CDs of WTC 7 collapse simulation ("Progressive Collapse") 2008. WTC Command summaries of FDNY's reports on environmental health and safety at WTC (June 2002). (Includes digital formats)
